source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

spells.description: Use: Grants the user invisibility for 14-18 sec. (10 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Safety fuses built into this device reduce the chance of its slotted tinker malfunctioning by up to 15%. Does not stack with similar specialization bonuses.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Crown of Autumnal Flora

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 460,153 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 223,910.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
